title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for July 24
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for July 24
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Scientific Games (SGMS). Scientific Games Inc.'s shares jumped to a nine-year high after the gaming and lottery equipment maker's second-quarter results were well received. The company's loss was narrower than the average analyst estimate in a Bloomberg survey, and revenue beat projections. Scientific Games also said it plans to refinance some of its debt to reduce interest costs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
